Curator's comments: Second of two Christy registration Slips/items numbered "+1783"; first is whip from Egypt. Registration Slip has drawing only, no provenance. Africa Q[uery] Register entry Af1973,Q.572 gives "North Africa ?", with "possibly West Africa" added by J[ohn] P[icton]. This apron has now been re-numbered Af,+,0.1783 to distinguish it from the whip (JMH 10/2016). Marked 'S M' in white on reverse.
Acquisition notes: Posssibly part of A W Franks (formerly Edward Lane collection) group but no indication on Slip.
